name: Project: Red Eyes (Demo)
description:
• NOTE-1: Hey guys! So I've been working on this project for a while now and suddenly it hit me what if it's not that fun??
  • NOTE-2: I know the trailer quality very bad because I recorded it on a potato (MY REALLY LOW PC). The game looks better than that so... Yeah....

So I decided to release a demo, which will only get a full version if you guys think the game is fun. So please download it and let me know what you think :)

DEMO HAS ONLY ONE MAP!

                                   

Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Are you fast enough? Test your skills in this first person zombie arena shooter.

Use various weapons to survive.

Build your own base with ingame building system

  • CONTROLS:
  1. W, A, S, D TO MOVE.
  2. TAB TO OPEN UP THE BUILDING SYSTEM.
  3. 'C' TO OPEN UP THE SHOP.
  4. 'M' to plant mines.

P.S.: Since it's a demo, it may have some bugs so if you happen to find any, let me know :)
